00035 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 BOOL LogParser::readLog()
00045 {
00046     BOOL updated = FALSE;
00047 
00048     int filenameLength = WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, mLogFilename, -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL );
00049     char *filenameAnsi = new char[filenameLength];
00050     WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, mLogFilename, -1, filenameAnsi, filenameLength, NULL, NULL );
00051     ifstream logFile( filenameAnsi, ios_base::in );
00052     delete[] filenameAnsi;
00053 
00054     if( logFile.good() )
00055     {
00056         const char  * logLine;
00057         std::string   logLineString;
00058         logFile.seekg( mParseEndOffset, ios_base::beg );
00059         if( mParseEndOffset == 0 )
00060         {
00061             char * number;
00062             char   timeString[20];
00063 
00064             memset( timeString, 0, sizeof( timeString ) );
00065             getline( logFile, logLineString );
00066             logLine = logLineString.c_str();
00067             strncpy( timeString, logLine, sizeof( timeString ) - 1 );
00068             mParseEndOffset = logFile.tellg(); //doesn't count '\n'
00069 
00070             number = strtok( timeString, "," );
00071             if( number != NULL ) mLogStartHr = atoi( number );
00072 
00073             number = strtok( NULL, "," );
00074             if( number != NULL ) mLogStartMin = atoi( number );
00075 
00076             number = strtok( NULL, "," );
00077             if( number != NULL ) mLogStartSec = atoi( number );
00078 
00079             number = strtok( NULL, "," );
00080             if( number != NULL ) mLogStartMillis = atoi( number );
00081 
00082             if( mLogStartHr < 12 )
00083             {
00084                 mIsMorning = TRUE;
00085                 if( mLogStartHr == 0 )
00086                 {
00087                     mLogStartHr = 12;
00088                 }
00089             }
00090             else
00091             {
00092                 mIsMorning = FALSE;
00093                 if( mLogStartHr != 12 )
00094                 {
00095                     mLogStartHr -= 12;
00096                 }
00097             }
00098         }
00099         if( !logFile.eof() )
00100             updated = TRUE;
00101         while( !logFile.eof() )
00102         {
00103             std::streamoff packetStartOffset;
00104 
00105             packetStartOffset = logFile.tellg();
00106             getline( logFile, logLineString );
00107             logLine = logLineString.c_str();
00108             mParseEndOffset = logFile.tellg();
00109             if( logLine[0] != '\0' && mParseEndOffset != -1 )
00110             {
00111                 // update the index
00112                 mLineOffset[ mLineCount ] = packetStartOffset;
00113                 mLineCount++;
00114             }
00115             else
00116             {    // at the end of the file
00117                 mParseEndOffset = packetStartOffset;
00118                 break;
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }
00122     logFile.close();
00123     return updated;
00124 }    /* readLog() */
00125 
00126 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 void LogParser::reset()
00130 {
00131     mParseEndOffset = 0;
00132     mLineCount = 0;
00133     mLineOffset.clear();
00134 }
00135 
00136 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00139 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 int LogParser::getLineCount() const
00141 {
00142     return mLineCount;
00143 }

00151     int aWidth

00154     mRenderWidth = aWidth;

00157 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 CString LogParser::formatMultiLineHex
00164     (
00165     int     aSize,
00166     uint8 * aData
00167     )
00168 {
00169     CString hexString;
00170     int charsPerLine = ( ( mRenderWidth - 86 ) / 15 );
00171     for( int i = 0; i < aSize; i++ )
00172     {
00173         //check screen size and format accordingly
00174         if( i != 0 && i % charsPerLine == 0 )
00175             hexString.AppendFormat( _T("\r\n+ x%03x\t\t"), i );
00176 
00177         //print the data
00178         hexString.AppendFormat
00179             (
00180             _T(" %02x"),
00181             aData[i]
00182             );
00183     }
00184     hexString.Append( _T("\r\n") );
00185     return hexString;
00186 }

00188 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00191 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 void LogParser::init( const CString& aFilename )
00193 {
00194     mLogFilename = aFilename;
00195     reset();
00196     readLog();
00197 }
